data.title: SPSJ International Award｜The Society of Polymer Science, Japan
data.meta_description: The association offers various opportunities to exchange and absorb information on polymer science and technology and related fields. Through these places, members can not only gain academic advancement and new development of research, but also deepen human interaction and international exchange among members.SPSJ International Award
data.meta_site_name: The Society of Polymer Science, Japan
